braillebot.rotateBraillebot: Rotate the robot with a speed
braillebot.moveBraillebot: Move the robot with a speed
braillebot.setMotorSpeed: Set the speed of each wheel of the robot
braillebot.setMotorSpeed|param|left: speed of left wheel of the robot
braillebot.setMotorSpeed|param|right: speed of right wheel of the robot
braillebot.showIcon: Show the icon with the corresponding motion of the robot
braillebot.showIcon|param|icon: Display the icon for the corresponding robot motion
braillebot.playTwoNotes: Play two notes for one beat each
braillebot.playTwoNotes|param|mode: Melody for Action status or Stop status
braillebot.lineTrackingSkipAndNextColor: Skip adjace color and start line tracking to the next color detection
braillebot.lineTrackingToNextColor: Line tracking to the next color detection
braillebot.showColorKey: Turn on LED based on detected color
braillebot.showColorKey|param|colorNumbe: the color number to display on the LED
